column4: hi i am getting segmentation faults when sshing into myself - does anyone have any suggestions?
you are typing   ssh localhost   and getting a segfault?
yes. plus putty wont connect either
from the same machine?   do you have any entries in /etc/hosts.deny   ??
any updates recently that might mean that your current sshd is out of date?
im still on feisty fawn. i havent updated for ages
dunno.    some dpkg command should be able to do it, but I know rpm betterer
i apt-get removed ssh and installed it
what would be the best way to update feisty fawn?
I dunno.   I would be tempted to do a fresh install, but thats just me.
do you have a separate home partition?
